name: Alchemical Golem
description: The Alchemical Golem is a Large Construct with a silver hide, enhanced by various alchemical infusions. It features syringes on its back and exhibits a threatening presence on the battlefield.
memorable: The ability to infuse itself with powerful admixtures for various combat effects makes the Alchemical Golem a unique and dangerous adversary.
goals: To serve its creator and act as a powerful guardian or enforcer in combat.
relations: Typically created by skilled alchemists or wizards.
environment: Can usually be found in laboratories, alchemical workshops, or places of arcane research.
strengths: High durability due to damage immunities and resistances, ability to deal area damage through Elemental Expulsion, and various alchemical enhancements.
weaknesses: Poor Dexterity makes it easy to hit, and it has no social capabilities due to low Charisma.
attacks: Can execute a Multiattack with two slam attacks that deal significant bludgeoning damage, and use Poison Breath for area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Alchemical Infusion allows temporary enhancements, including potent poison breath and increased speed or defensive capabilities.
additional_information: Resistance to acid, cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Immunity to conditions like charmed, exhaustion, and frightened.
Magic resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Cannot alter its form due to Immutable Form ability.
Magic weapons mean its attacks bypass certain defenses.
